title: New: Black City Lights – Give It Up
body:
Opening with an Omar Little-esque whistle is a fairly bold way to return after a year since your last release, and that’s precisely what New Zealand duo **Black City Lights** do.

One part **The XX**, one part **Siouxsie and the Banshees**, it’s foreboding, ambitious and above all, a glorious comeback, expect to hear a lot more from this duo over the coming months. _Give It Up_ is taken from their debut LP, _**Another Life**_, out 6th August.
